title: 254 - Down with Sighty
description: Dan explains his feelings on Nazis, The Game Grumps (Arin Hanson & Dan Avidan) visit the show, then the gang continues their role playing adventures. Featuring Dan Harmon, Jeff Davis, Spencer Crittenden, Arin Hanson, Dan Avidan and Steve Levy.
lastTitle: 253 - No Church People Got No Hortches
